The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 February is 3,566,965 (6,337.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 12 February, there were 80,364 new confirmed cases (142.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 February, there were 114,235 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 30% (33,871 fewer cases).
